title: 【解密】MASTERING THE MIND|控制思想|1.11.2|COMPSCIGIRL523
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:16 编辑 




简介 InfoDo you have what it takes to master your mind?Solve 6 different types of puzzles based on Emotions, Memory, Imagination, Perspective, Coordination, and Logic in order to reach the control center of your brain and Master the Mind!This map uses a built in custom texture pack. If it is not working, you can download the texture pack here to manually install it.你有什么需要掌握你的头脑吗？解密6个不同的以情感，记忆，想象力，协调和逻辑为基础的关卡来到达你大脑的中心来掌握它！这张地图有材质包，已经在地图包里了，如果它失效了，你可以在这里下载。





规则 rules1. Play on Normal
2. Play with Sound On
3. Play with Auto-jump Off
4. Click >>> to advance text

1-正常游玩
2-在开声音的情况下游玩
3-在自动跳跃的情况下游玩
4-点 >>> 到进阶的文字




图片 pictures













下载 downlaod原地址（推荐，支持作者）

国内网盘
